name: Timely Ltd
overview:
Timely is an appointment system for clinics, salons, practices and any business operator that takes appointments, likes to save time and get new customers.

Timely has a beautiful calendar. You can flick between Month, Week and Day views, drag and drop appointments, filter for specific locations and staff, color your products, view pending appointments at a glance, easily see notifications like contra-alerts or VIP customers and lots more.

Your appointments can also be synced with other calendars including Microsoft Outlook, Google Calendar or Apple Calendar.

Flexible appointments Add, edit and remove appointments with ease. Save hours of time by setting up recurring appointments. Pencil-in, rebook, no-show, cancel or reschedule with the click of a button.

Use “busy time” to block off your calendar for lunch, meetings or to just have a break!

SMS and email reminders Reduce no shows by up to 80% with SMS & email reminders to the customer prior to their appointment.

Understand your business Timely has a full suite of reports to help you track your growth and build a picture of your customer behaviour.

And the dashboard provides a handy snapshot of your business performance and activity.

Online bookings With Timely you get online bookings out of the box.

Pop a booking button on your website and customers can book appointments online in a few easy steps, anywhere, any time, from any device.

Appointments can be instantly booked or you can accept/decline them from your calendar. You decide!

Works with Xero and Vend Timely integrates seamlessly with Xero allowing you to reconcile appointment payments with your bank transactions, raise invoices and more.

If you sell merchandise as part of your business Timely and Vend talk to each other seamlessly to make the point of sale process a breeze.

You’re in safe hands with Timely Your data is secure, private and always backed up All accounts come with free support Completely web based - access your account from anywhere No minimum contracts One month, no obligation free trial Any currency, any time zone support
